Subject: Re: Serpentor VS Lunaprine

Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

Serpentor:



Serpentor felt great pain in his arm, trying to keep it up.  This bot was 
getting irritating and didn't know when to fall down.  He knew it would be 
dumb to try and pull his arm free, and he was racing to think of something.  
He saw a leg of Luna's moving to swipe at his face.  He followed it for a 
brief moment, firing a single optic blast at the incoming paw as it got 
closer, trying to stop it, or blow it up as an added bonus.
